Reviews.Title: “Good trip - decent place for the beach”
Reviews.Author: trudybob
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with friends and had a great time. Our rooms were right next to each other. Granted, I've never stayed in OC MD at a 4 or 5 star place (unless it was an expensive privately owned condo), most are just mediocre establishments. That being said, the place was clean, service was friendly and room was adequate.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay at the Riviera Motel!”
Reviews.Author: T G
Reviews.Content: First and last time Me and my son will ever stay at the Riviera Motel, Ocean City. The rooms are not in the worst condition, all of the furniture is old, small beds, dirty chairs, brown panel on the walls. Bathroom was clean, but the toilet seat was years old and badly stained, carpet needs to be replaced, wall air conditioner that barely got cold, still using the old tv in the rooms for entertainment, no frig or microwave in room. The best of are trip has been the beach, boardwalk, the motel is a bad experience. I booked three nights and decided I wanted to leave after two, the motel would not refund me for the third night although the place is a dump and not comfortable. Riviera management got my money this time but will never get it it again. They offer a cheaper rate than most motels OC, but your not getting a deal if the room isn't comfortable. Take my advice pay 20 to 30 more and stay at a nicer motel. It may be a good idea to ask to see the room before making the reservation. DO NOT STAY AT THE RIVIERA MOTEL IN OCEAN CITY, MARYLAND. Gross!!

Reviews.Title: “The Truth”
Reviews.Author: 6familys
Reviews.Content: I was at first I ignored the bad reviews and aimed at the good ones. That was a horrible choice. I was very unsatisfied. Let's start with the room. Most of the drawers fell out when you pull them, the beds had alot of weird stains, and the bathroom had dirty black specks in it. The pool was okay, the first few days had a ton of leaves in the pool. The hallway was really dirty, the carpet was ripped and teared and had smelly stains everywhere. I was wondering why they didn't PUT any room pictures on the website. Obviously when you look at the outside, it seems amazing by the bright colors. Wrong again. The rooms we booked were all different. One with 3 beds, one with 2, one with a couch, one without one; even though we asked for the same rooms. The air conditioning was perfect for a hot day. Close to the beach, no crossing streets. Overall I was disappointed and wouldn't come back.

Reviews.Title: “VERY UPSET MOTEL HAS GONE DOWNHILL”
Reviews.Author: tina h
Reviews.Content: We have been going here for years as a family, this year was the worst!!! we are looking into other areas, people where hanging on the balconys all nite with music blasting and people partying till 3am, couldnt sleep and rooms were dirty!!! such a shame use to be a nice family motel,place is poorly manage.

Reviews.Title: “Place to sleep”
Reviews.Author: bawalker63
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a week with a few friends. Not the classiest hotel, but it was a cool place to sleep. I will say the rooms are bigger than most hotels. We had an efficiency with 2 full beds and a pull-out couch. The air conditioner keeps the room cold. I wouldn't recommend it to families, but if you need a cold room to lie your head at night close to the beach, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: beachfun04
Reviews.Content: lets start with the bad...smelly hallway, smelly room, room was not up to date, hole in the shower curtain, no mini-fridge, terrible bed felt like springs were jabbing you in the back all night, parking was not engineered right if you park under the building, dirty windows going out to balcony, mirror in bathroom was made for people 6 foot or taller, AC unit was not proper size for the hole that was in wall you could see to the outside in some spots, and the list goes on....but the best part was the housekeeping they kept the room clean and with fresh sheets and towels(smell of the room went away more once housekeeping was in there the first day but something still lingered around). the location is also nice due to it being so close to the boardwalk.....but the bottom line is ill never stay here again ill pay the extra money to stay somewhere nice n descent

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: brittanysni87
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a long weekend and will never come back to stay here again. The AC unit on the wall was off centered and must of leaked on the wall that made the wall crack. The sliding glass door was so dirty that you could not see thru it. The ceiling in the bathroom was drop ceiling and looked like it was gonna fall. When we first walked in the room it smelled of cigars and the floor looked dirty. The only good thing about our stay was a working bathroom (hot water) and the housekeeping daily.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable and Respectful”
Reviews.Author: lisahackley
Reviews.Content: I stayed there the first week of August. We did have a leaky roof problem but once reported to the management they not only moved me to a new room but also offered to help carry our belongings. Yes, this place is not new but they try to keep this clean and affordable. Staff was great.

Reviews.Title: “senior beach week - great location”
Reviews.Author: JRMaryland
Reviews.Content: Rivera Motel Great location, on boardwalk and just steps from the beach. This motel met the needs of the recent graduates who were spending the week in Ocean City for “beach week”. The management was responsive to guests and responsible regarding housekeeping service. All amenities were functional such as refrigerator, a/c, TV, and bathroom. Clean pool with deck chairs. Great location!

Reviews.Title: “***....Loved it...***”
Reviews.Author: wingsliktheagle
Reviews.Content: It is not a 5 star motel but its great in price an service too...to have a good time u dont need a 5 star motel u just need money to spend...and the Riviera is the cheapest and i love it....

Reviews.Title: “liked the place”
Reviews.Author: bronco24
Reviews.Content: came with a few friends over for the car show. We needed an affordable place to stay over for the weekend. Riviera was a good choice in the end. It was cheaper than most motels around town. The motel looked old from the outside and so was our room but it had everything a motel room would have. It was spacious, the sheets, towels and in general the room was clean and smelled good. The rooms were also cleaned every day. Enjoyed the pool and it was easy to get onto boardwalk since the motel is on the ocean side.

Reviews.Title: “Okay place for a cheap price”
Reviews.Author: TravelTheWorldd
Reviews.Content: We atayed two nights here and it was an alright place. Other hotels (Hilton, Holiday Inn, etc.) charged over $400 a night! We set on a cheap place like this. It wasn't the greatest but it was okay. It had a nice pool and balconies. It was only one block from oceanfront, which was nice...There was a pancake place across the street and great walking distance to the ocean and boardwalk. It was at the end of the boardwalk, by the way. They didn't have many features, but you can't really expect that much for such a cheap price. Some of the other guests were quiete rude. Alot of them were college students and did not care about disturbing the peace.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: helton926
Reviews.Content: This was the worst stay at OC. Dirt under beds,around floors/walls. Glass on bathroom floor. Need new carpet in room(BIG SPOTS ON FLOOR). Sink in kitchen dripped. Kitchen ceiling falling. No remote control for tv. No alarm clock or clock at all. Light on dresser didn't work. Piles of towels and sheets by swimming pool and under carport. Dumpsters next to our room, with trash on floor around them. These are not quality rooms which their sign says. Especially for the price. We stayed in ROOM 219. This hotel needs to be remodeled and maids that know how to clean. We were very disappointed. We arrived on a Friday and there were no other vacancies anywhere. We had reservations on Monday at another Hotel, just decided to come a couple days early and find one for a couple days.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutley Disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: pickle255
Reviews.Content: This was the worst motel/hotel I have ever stayed in! My boyfriend and I were looking for something affordable located in a convenient place; close to the beach, boardwalk, and hotspots. Well we found the Riviera; our biggest vacation mistake. The room had a sickening foul odor. The beds were lopsided and had petruding springs which left us sleepless and in significant pain. The crown molding was hanging off the walls. The furniture was old and broken. The bathroom appeared clean at first only to discover that the sink was falling out of the wall and the curtain rod fell into the shower, twice. This place is horrible and I would not recommend to anyone under any circumstance!

Reviews.Title: “pleased”
Reviews.Author: suttonfamily
Reviews.Content: we drove to ocean city with reservations to stay some where else but when we saw the other place we left to go and find another room, others were very expensive so we settled on the riviera motel we got a great deal. its an older motel yes but we had room service every day, pool was cleaned every day as well was nice to see this that! and all visitors that was not staying there had to be out by 11pm had the employer walking around to make sure there was no loud noises was very pleased with our stay there!

Reviews.Title: “awesome place to stay for the weekend”
Reviews.Author: selandur
Reviews.Content: I have stayed a couple of summers there , more than 15 day total, and I can say that it is really nice!! It is the prefect place to rent a room if you are coming to the resort for a few days and don't have any reservation previously made. It has everything what a good accomodation must provide for the people to have great time: clean bathroom, nice porch, spacy bedroom with big beds (so big that five people can sleep in a room for two). The statement that the mattresses are lumpy is absolutely rubbish. And that after you stay in the room for a day your hair gets curl sound pretty amazing for me, isn't it? Besides that you are there not to stay in the room whole day but to enjoy the beach and the ocean. And it just 6 feet from your doorstep, you just have to cross the boardwalk and ... wide beachvolley grounds, sun umbrellas all over, different colours but still a lot of space for everybody. Next to the motel is working handsome guy , always very polite, renting bodyboards to try the waves if you want , there is paraplaning and so on.... I can not say anything to complain about the motel staff : there is all the time someone at the reception to help you if you need somethng , the night shift person is very big guy, russian, who can deal easily with all drunk tourists returning from the clubs and interrupting renters' sleep. There is houskeeping every other day. The swimming pool is big indeed and I have never seen somebody sleeping on the lounges next to it. May be there are one or two empty beer cans on the parking lot but the people are there also to party , don't you think? Finally , the price are really good and the managers can always make you discount if you are staying for further period.
